entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 a.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 6:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Rain along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
